TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表處理 之 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派定義為事件類別。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以存取事件類別藉由指定名為的副程式**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期間引發事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 建構物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 您可以使用屬性物件提供給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果您未指定的值屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則屬性物件設定為傳回的識別方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property of the object is set to the identity returned by the method. **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，才引發的時機驗證設和是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
